name: Conversational Recommendation System
details: Modelled an automated prototype which provides real-time recommendations on E-Commerce products on the basis of conversational data of users.

Architected a sentimentally aware recommendation model in python using glove-wiki-gigaword-50 word vector package, that calculates recommendations as fast as 5 seconds and has an accuracy greater than 80%.
Implemented a template E-Commerce website in React JS which displays 15 product categories, and allows users to get best 3 product recommendations, with additional personalization on the client-side.
Authored and presented research paper titled ”Conversational Recommendation System using NLP and Sentiment Analysis” at ISETE conference.
Link to the project: Model Client Website Research

name: Screenplay App
details: Developed a comprehensive portal, used by 20+ aspiring and professional screenplay writers.
Included detailed theoretical concepts and tricks, used in more than 100 award-winning screenplays.
Customized an industry-standard, 100% accurately formatted script editor, by programming advanced DOM Manipulation using Javascript.
Link to the project: Screenplay App

name: Grapple VR
details: Envisioned and created an interactive platformer VR game as a part of a 2 day sprint.
Led a team of 5 and implemented a customized grappling feature, developed using C# scripts.
